values: New LJ. Again. IM me and I'll give it to you. Maybe. Depends on who it is. oo; Or check your "Friend of:" list. I'm adding peoples. If you see anyone you don't know, odds are it's me.

I'm on the phone with Sash now. I feel more depressed than I've felt in a long time. My mother told me today that my dad got a job offer in New Zealand and he's thinking about moving there. I cried in the car. Then, mom and I were talking about dinner. She had said yesterday that we might be able to go to Pio's. But then she realized Boo's dad went out of town, so we couldn't. Then I asked if I could go to a movie. No. Then she told me we could rent movies. We didn't. Then I could have Sash over. I couldn't. She's at her cousin's. And then tomorrow she has two play things. All day. So I'll only get to see her at Dragonfly. Though, I know the moment I do, everything'll just be forgotten. Problems just go whoosh down the drain when she hugs me.. Though she doesn't usually. I hug her. I doubt this entry will make her feel better, seeing as my mood has affected hers, which I'm sorry for. I'm just tired, and menstral, and a series of unfortunate events has just clouded over today. I don't know why it drives me wild, but having my plans ruined gets me down. I get my hopes up, only to get soaked when someone rains on my parade. No umbrella. Which is my fault, but still.

We're going to Busch Garden's Howl-O-Scream Saturday. I'm afraid. Bri said something about chainsaws and loud noises. *shudders* Sash's a pansy, though, so she can't be my knight in armour. I still love her dearly, though, don't fret. God, I do love her. I needed her so much tonight, but yeah.. I'm not going to dwell on it seeing as I've upset her enough. Anyway, it's getting on one am, I said I'd go to bed at midnight. So much for that. Good night.

Blah. I'm really only updating this to say hi to Sash during the day. Don't expect anything, really. Hi, Sash. x3 How goes esquela? I know you won't get this till later, but G'mornin', Sunshine. Anyway. I cooked dinner for the past two nights. Tuesday was Orange Roughy encrusted in seasoned bread crumbs with a lemon-y sauce. And last night was "Beef medalions with mushrooms in a brandy cream sauce". It was okay, apparently. I'm happy. I wore the skirt Bri forced me to buy yesterday. We went to the mall to be shopping and stuff. oo; I got a dress, a necklace, two shirts and a skirt. I didn't want it, but Bri was like "You have to!" So I did. I like it, actually. >> It makes my hips and bum look nice. oo; Oh, and I found coolies pirate boots (Bri won't let me use hers --;), but they were pleather and really hot.. And Debby said that I shouldn't, so I think I'll go with my mom and ask her what she thinks. I hope I can get my eyebrows done and get my haircut today. I want the bangs shorter and it layered more dramatically. Blah. The bell for the news hasn't rung yet. I hope it does soon.

K. Hi, Sash. :) So, I finish the typing thing today. They took away the backspace.. And I've forgotten I could use it. xx; So.. Yeah. We have a sub so I'm being bad and usign the internet. Uh. Love chu, I'ma go do my English homework from Friday.

Blah. I don't see the logic, but that's okay. So. Oh, HI SASH. x3 *giggle* I have Typing first period, she has it sixth.. So yeah. :P Uh.. Don't take a nap when you get home. I want to call. So, yeah. I called Bri last night after we hung up, so I could find out her sign and finish her Sim, and she was all

Stoled.
*instert down arrow*
Leave a comment with your name if you want to know what I really think of you, and I'll reply and tell you. No lies, all honesty.
Then, put this crap in your journal so that I can get an equally harsh response. ;)

K. I've been living with friends for the past six days because of lack of power and/or cable and internet. Blah. Frances knocked us out.. But I did get a week of school off. I'm leaving Sunday for New Zealand. I'm not sure I want to go. But it'll be okay. K.. I'm done.

So, I'm in BST (Business Systems & Typing, or some holy shit like that). I'm just.. I don't know. Kinda bored. I have the internet in front of me, but I can't get on AIM or YIM to talk to people. Blarg. Not that the people I want to talk to would be up/on. GOD. Did I tell you people about my art class? It's the lamest piece of shit I've ever seen. We're drawing flags and we had to write mythology for our own country. BLAH. Oh, well. I'll survive. Hopefully we do something of a more.. Artistic nature. Oh! And if we get a call from the district school thingy, we won't have school tomorrow. Wouldn't that just be the greatest?

I haven't been updating recently, but I haven't had anything to say.. Uh..
I think this guy in my English class likes me.. Yeah.. He's kinda cute, but I don't know him. oo; Besides. I love Will.
Uh.. I hope this weekend goes okay, other wise I won't get to see Sasha at all. See, Debbie's boss wants to take her, Franklin, and Bri to dinner on the night we'd get together at Dragonfly. So, yeah. They're going to Dragonfly, but we're not invited. We could go there while they're there, and go home with them, but that all depends on if my mother wants to go to Dragonfly. Or.. We could get Sasha and go to Bri's after they get home, but that if they want to drive, OR, Debbie could drive around and pick us up, OR, lastly, we could just show up. oo;
Yep. So. I'll go write in the /other/ now. Psh. Secret my ass.

I had a nice dream last night.. I dreampt about Will. We were in New York, only it looked nothing like New York. I guess.. It was very nice.. There wasn't a lot of cuddling, or touching or anything. But there were light kisses and times when we would just touch hands. It felt good. Just .. Yeah.. I wasn't really near him, but it felt real.. So, yeah.

To be continued.
Seems like Will and I get in a fight every night. That's not normal, is it? I need major guidence.

Okay, so it was the first day of school. Very boring. Very slow. I hope I like my teachers more into the year.. Uhm. Went to Pio's tonight with Bri, Mom, and Bob. It was so much fun. OMG was it fun. We had an air-blowing contest, and I tried to teach my mom the thing Sash taught me, with the corks, but she couldn't get it. And then we were talking with water in our mouths and she spit it everywhere.. Bob I think was embarrassed.. But I've never had that much fun. I don't know what to think anymore. I don't feel as close to Will as I used to.. I'm trying, but it just doesn't come. I mean, I don't want this thing between us to die.. Because I love him, and he loves me.. And he makes me feel.. I can think of him at any time and get a smile.. He makes me feel.. Wonderful. I've made him cry, I've made him cut, I've made him sick to his stomach, but still he refuses the idea that I'm no good for him. Still he wants me. Still he loves me.. I think if I ever met him.. I'd kill myself before leaving. :/ He absolutely adorable, the way he stumbles while he talks, his 'wiff', the sudden 'tell me you love me's, the way he'll go silent if I say the right thing, the way I know when he's smiling, the way he knows me, the way he'll repeat stories over again.. No one's ever wanted me so much.. I don't think. -- Take your records, take your freedom, Take your memories, I don't need 'em. Take your space, and take your reasons, But you'll think of me. Take your cap, leave my sweater, 'Cause we have nothing left to weather, In fact, I feel a whole lot better, That you'll think of me.

Yeah so, Ringo? It's apparently lead poisoning. I'm pretty sure it was the zipper on my zipper shirt.. He's getting better, though. He's at the animal hospital. They're treating him.

Blarg. I'm not allowed to do stuff until my summer reading is done.. Or maybe started. Like really started. Or something. Not sure. But I couldn't go out with Bri today. It made me sad. I mean, when my mother tells me I can't go, does she have to be such a bitch about it? :x

I currently have both messengers on away.. And am just sitting here. 'Cause I don't want to hear what people have to say.

Will made me cry.. In fact, I still am. Apparently I was being arrogant.. I didn't mean to.. And so yeah. When I said I was going to bed he's like "Bye." And then I said, "Fine, Dan. I won't call. >/" And.. *figures out a way of saying this that won't make her sob more*.. well, he said, "I didn't ask you to." I don't know if it's just me, or what, but that was.. Really mean.. I mean, overly mean for the situation.. He's never been mad at me before.. Well, actually, maybe he has.. But he was never mean.. I don't know.. Maybe things are falling apart.. I think they are.. Sometimes I just want to scream "IT'S OVER". On more than a couple occasions I've had that urge, but it usually only lasts a couple minutes.. And then I don't.. But yeah.. After reacting /this way/ to him just being mad at me.. I don't know what I'd do without him..

And, what's more. He does this when I know I'm scared for Ringo. Something's wrong with his feet. He's walking on his little elbows and he can't clench his feet.. We're taking him to the vet tomorrow.. I'm really scared..

God, am I the most unreasonable bitch ever, or what? And why the Hell can't I sleep? It's like, I come on, and I find Will running around with a chick named "Rem". Blah. I don't know why.. But it really hurt. I mean, do you get it, 'cause if so, I'd really like to know what's going on in my brain. It made me feel like /crying/, wtf? I think.. I think it told me 'I don't need you', but.. Yeah.. I also don't think that's what he meant. God. I AM the most unreasonable bitch ever.
Bleh. I'm going to toss and turn and /not/ sleep, now. K.

Oookay. Uh. Nothing to say really. Something just freaked Ringo out. o.o
I have an awesome night planned. >> Maggie's coming over, maybe Bri, and we're gonna watch movies and eat junk. And if Bri comes we're going to do lots of henna. o.o Whee. Okay. That's it.

You are Colombia. You rock in that special way only
the squeaky can.

Which Rocky Horror character are you?
brought to you by Quizilla Holy crap. People were right. o.o

Finally home. Ringo's gone insane. He's sitting on my shoulder and every so often beating his wings, sometimes on me. o.-; I think he really wants to fly. Anyway. Nothing to say.
I want to go to dinner and a movie with just my mom. It'd be so fun. :/ I need to  talk to her about it.

Will update later.

I'm at Bri's house currently. She's getting dressed so we can go to a movie. Holy crap, I stayed up till 6 am talking to Will. x.x Never. Again. I had to take a nap to make it to three. Feh.. Was.. Fun, though.. :3 We're going to see A Cinderella Story, purely for the Chad Michael Murray action. xD I said to Bri earlier, Will, her, and myself, would make an awesome trio. It'd be so fun. ><; The three of us hangin' out. OMG. Three-way call. :O JUST now occurred to me. I'm trying to get her to make an LJ, but I don't think she's a fan of the other-people-being-able-to-read bit. Oh, well. I'll bribe her. :P I got a new ring for my cell. It's "Where Did Our Love Go?". Baby, baby, Where did our love go? Ooo... Don't you want me? Don't you want me no more? Ooo... Baby. It's a great motown song, and if you don't know who did it, you should be shot. And please tell me you know what motown is. -.-;

New - COOL Dating Tips and Romance Advice!

FUCKING HELL. WHO DOES HE THINK HE IS? He was the WORST relationship I've EVER HAD. And believe me. I've had bad ones. He freaks me out even more than.. ARGH. AND HE CALLED ME. MATTHEW SNYDER, MR. GAY, CALLED ME. FUCKING HELL. BUT HAH. My phone lost signal. Probably as close as I could ever come to hanging up on someone. FUCKER. KEEP AWAY FROM ME. I DON'T CARE ABOUT YOU. AT ALL. You could die. You could live. You could live like a movie star, you could live like a bum. IT DOESN'T FUCKING MATTER. JUST SO LONG AS IT'S NO WHERE NEAR ME. STOP THINKING ABOUT ME. STOP WHATEVER. Just.. Go away.
Anyway. Booboo's birthday party was tonight. I took Ringo to Steven's house. Mm. I had Ruffles for the first time in.. I dunno, but now I'm hooked again. Damnit. I'm gonna get fat. D: Ter..
Bri SOBETTERNOT be busy tomorrow. I know where she lives.

Uhm. Yeah. Completely redid it again. Planning on going to bed in a few. Sash's bummed because her and Maggie aren't lasting. She's afraid of being alone. Well, so was I, but that didn't matter..
I love Will. o.o Yes. I keep telling him to write about me in his LJ, but I don't write about him. :P SO. I bought him a racoon in Amsterdam, a stuffed one. 'Cause they don't have them in Hawaii. o.o And I bought him.. Crap.. What are they called? Spankies? Smarties! That's it. Anyway. Yeah. I need to send them to him. o.o Today is our one-month anniversary. :3 Also my sister's birthday. o.-; Erf.
Hmm.. What else.. What else.. There was something I wanted to say, but I can't remember now. Oh, well. Ta'.

Yay. Lookit my LJ. Iddn't it pretty? Uh. Sash did most of the HTML.. Well, all of it. Okay. o.-; But. I redid it. :D Sort of. Changed colors and picture and widths and stuff. But whateva. Thankyous, Sash. :3 
Ringo keeps pooping everywhere. I don't get his deal.

God. I feel like crying. What the Hell is it with people and wanting to make me feel like crap? First, in camp, Sash's in the corner, and she's terribly upset, I can tell. What, she thinks she can pull this crap over on me? Anyway, yeah. I ask what's wrong (about four-zillion times before she decides I know something's up) and she says, 'I don't think she loves me'. I felt like my brain was going to burst out of my temple. I wanted to scream. But instead. I hugged her. I did what I could to comfort her, but that only pushed out the tears.. Sigh. I said I didn't know. Which I don't. I almost fell down the stairs trying to get out of the building afterward. I don't need that. I hate that fucking room. I hate that place.. I hate those memories. Might not bother her one fucking bit, but it scares the crap out of me.
I cried last night. Just because. I don't understand why this camp thing has me so riled, but apparently Will does.. I guess it's the memories. They're plastered everywhere. Like neon signs. Blinking and blinking. And the people. They don't care if I'm there or not. Sash says 'oh, they do'. But darin', I can tell. They dont. Dan's not as nice as I thought. The Kelsey's are.. But.. Yeah. I'm tired.. Of feelign this way. And it started.. Sunday night.
We went to see Ringo today. My dad, step-mom, Martina, Andrew. They met him for the first time. They're leaving for New Zealand tomorrow. Anyway. Andrew was scared of him. Martina petted him. Daddy kissed him. Anna held him. He was so excited to see me he jumped out of his cage and onto my face.. Scratched my lip. I miss that little guy..
Ick. My hands are twitching. I'm doing my best to stay away from razors and other various sharp things. But it's like.. Terribly hard.

First day of Act Up. Why do I loathe it so?
Maybe because it makes me lonely for 6 hours,
and there's plenty of other stuff I'd rather do.
I feel like crying. My step-mom needs the computer,
so I think I'll go suffer in my room for a bit.
Sasha's all "I'd like for you to be here".
I'm all "I HAVE to be here". And so I will. Wasting my time.
Leaving my heart behind. Blahblahblah.
I hate you all.

GODDAMNIT TO FUCKING HELL. If I want to be a lazy-ass, and sit around all summer, then damnit I will. No more of these fucking camps. I'm so bummed I'm about to cry! I really don't want anything to do with these people. Not anymore. I thought, hey, good. Let's make-nice. No. I don't give a shit what they think of me. -.- Why should I? I DON'T WANT TO WAKE UP AND DRAG MYSELF AROUND FOR SIX HOURS A DAY. I HAD PLANS TOMORROW. FUCKING ASSWIPES. -.- Why did I ever? Why did I ever want to go back?
On a happier note I just got a new birdy. Name's Ringo. He's a Jenday Conure. He's my baby.

I've been replaced. :( Someone (remaining nameless) replaced me when I went to Europe. Lesigh. It's depressing. And then Will's saying that all he's managed to do is upset me since I got back. That's not true. >< I'm just in a bad mood. God. I hate when I get replaced. ;-; It makes me feel like I wasn't good enough.. Which is probably true, considering they replaced me. Random internet people, Sash, and now nameless. AND WHY THE HECK IS MY MOTHER SQUEALING?! *twicth* I have to go shut her up.

I'M HOME. Holy crap. The cutest thing in the world is a bird's eyelashes. They're adorable! And yes, they have eyelashes. I'm so tired. Jet-lagged, but then at the same time I'm extremely hyper. I should sleep probably, but not until I get to talk to Will. I watched "Taking Lives" on the plane. I felt bad for the villian. >> I think he genuinely liked her, but he was just too fucked up. :/ My brain hurts. Well, techinically the muscles around my skull. But close enough. Rabble.

The End.


P.S. I love Will.
Dude. Twice in a row I've managed to update on the dot. o.o; *points*

My left pant leg is wet. They were in the washer.

I be's leaving for Europe tomorrow.
Willy, e-mail me: CarrotTopp77@aol.com
And update your LJ. *nods*

Ugh. I was supposed to call Heather tonight, but eh. I don't know. 
I have to get up tomorrow. By one. Which would damage my three-days-in-a-row waking up at 2:30 thing I have going on. My dad's coming to work on my Europe wardrobe because for some fucking reason I have to look like I'm middle-aged. Yes. Well. I actually can't wait to go. I want to take a bazillion and three pictures.
I used all my Launchcast skips. ;-;
I'm turning my bird into an owl. He's up all night with me. x3 Loooouie. One of the finches doesn't look so good. He looks kinda moth-eaten. We need to take him to the vet.
I love Willy. D: Too much. He needs to come here and be my blanket. Mrawr. Speaking of which, it's about time to call him. :3

AHHHH. I got my camera! SQUEE. Lookit: http://oculii.deviantart.com/ I took those. :3 Yeah. I went to dinner with my aunt and uncle and I came home and WHAM. It was right there. :3 On my desk. AHHH. x3
Yeah. I went to dinner with my aunt and uncle, and they got me the tenth in my favorite book series.. The thing just happened to have come out TODAY. Lmao. I'm amused. Bri's going to be so jealous. x3 CACKLE.

James Marsters went and got a buzzcut. ;-; *screams* He was so pretty! But now.. :/ Lesigh. I really have nothing to say. Uh. I don't know what to do. Yeah. And I love you. o.o You know who. :P I'm so bored. I'm supposed to be going to Europe Friday, and all I can think about is how I'll be gone when Bri's home. >< Fuck. I'm so lame. I just want to go to Dragonfly with her. ;-; I'm having withdrawls. *convulses*

Well. The beach was pretty much boring and uneventful.. Until the night I over heard my dad and step-mother talking about me behind my back. They were saying how I didn't deserve to go to this nice restuarant. I've been trying to be better! But really, now that I know this, what's the point? My father still hasn't apologized for it and it's been what? Three days? Oh, and then today he slapped me. Yep. Square on the jaw. Apparently I "had a tone". Yeah, well, that's what happens when your step-mother calls you a lazy girl. Who do they think they are? I was talking on the phone with my mother while they were transporting stuff from the car to the house and whatnot. Well, I apparently didn't notice on my own so they had to yell and hit me. If they asked nicely I'd be glad to. God. Never in my life have I been hit in the face until today. And now, it was by my own father. 

On a lighter note. Nyah! I'm finally home. But.. Willy's off somewhere probably sleeping.. Or, it's because I got mad at him last night.. He told me he was "waiting for me to leave", and I got a bit upset. Though, now I realize I blew it out of proportion. ;-; I'm so sorry, Willy. ;-;-; Sorrysorrysorrysorrysorry.

I'm having a bad day. :/

*yawn* Going to the beach today. Was hoping to catch Willy 'fore I went. :< I guess you can tell I didn't. He's still a-sleepin'. Oh, well. Sleep tight, Paniolo. <3
It's going to be my Uncle's birthday, so we're going to visit him and take him to dinner. Then I come back Sunday, and leave Monday for a different beach with a different parent. Boy. This is all crazy-wacked. *hums* Anyyyway. Uh. Really nothing else.. <3 Paniolo. Yez.

Yay. I needed a change of scenery.. Though it doesn't match the login anymore. Oh, well. I think it's pretty. Went swimming today, with Darinka, my Slovak cousin who's visiting us. She speak okay english. Anyway. My mom called me earlier. To yell at me. About my quarter grade in English, the note she got saying I had to go see Guidance, and how "why couldn't I be more like Josh and Blair?" -.- *Mutter* Oh, and she told me I was overweight. She thinks I'm clinically depressed, and wants me to go to a shrink. Again. God. Just because she's on two anti-depressants doesn't mean I'm depressed. Although, I have no idea. Thanks mom. The only problem I have is -you-. And just for the record, I went to Guidance to sign-up for my classes. u.u

I had an extensive entry, but IE ate it, and I really don't feel like redoing it yet. It might get done, might not. Depending on how long it takes for me to get to work, and if I remember what I wrote before.

Okay. Well. School is finally freaking over. I got a new bird. He's (maybe) bright yellow, and I named he Lou. I love him dearly. Omg. @.@ That's about it with him. I'm in the middle of training him and today he sat on my finger. Twice. Yeah.
Willy and I are talking again, which is nice, because he is. Nice. o.o I don't annoy him, apparently, which is also nice. I like him. Lots. <4 Yeah.
Bri and I stayed up till one am last night, the night before our last two finals. Yeah. So anyway, apparently there's this pink donkey-unicorn named Leroy the 3rd. He likes to dress up as a nija and eat alphabet soup. I'm very sleepy now, but I dunno if I can tear myself away from Willy. >>

So we're riding home from La Fiesta, and I'm blowing bubbles for Andrew's entertainment, and Martina smacks her hand onto my arm and goes "Dog paw--", then she digs her nails into me and drag them down, "cat's claw." And I'm all "WTF?!" But then later, she did it to herself and she leans over and goes, "Can I tell you a secret?" I'm all, "Sure." She's like, "When I do that to myself, it makes my butt tickle."

My bird died.. The cat ate him.. I'm so depressed now. He was awesome. There was this one time, we let him out during dinner, and he came over to my plate and started eating the gravy left on it.. And he liked champagne.. And then he sauntered across the entire serving dish of lamb. I laughed for about a half hour. I miss him so much. He was like.. Another person, yanno? He would talk, and he really liked my singing. He was annoying as crap when we let him out, 'cause he would fly back and fourth from our heads to his perch.. She took his head off. Mom wouldn't let me see him, but I snuck a peek when she went to the store.. He looked terrible. She said, that when she found him, his legs were sticking straight up in the air.. He loved everyone, though he might have been a chicken.. He never bit anyone. Why did you leave me? I needed you.

This might be.. having to do with other feelings I'm feeling..

We'll take the whole shebang, all or nothing, anything. Ecstacy's the birthright of our gang. We'll take the whole shebang, free your heart of guilt and shame. Come and claim what's yours, the whole shebang. I've found my favorite song. ^ <3 I've also found my favorite CD. ^ <33

Well. My little sister just SQUIRTED THE TV WITH A FUCKING WATER GUN. THE LITTLE ROACH. I'M SO GONNA SLAP HER IF SHE SAYS A SINGLE WORD TO ME. -.o; Fucking moron. Idiot. FUCKING ANOREXIC FIVE YEAR OLD.
I went to Sash's party. Was something I could've missed.. Watching her and Maggie. Seeing them go hide in the closet.. Although, I think it was good for me. To help me forget. I'm bummed though.. I have no one.. And she does.. That's just not fair...

Tomorrow is Sasha's birthday. She's taking me, and all the Hippodrome people to a karaoke place. I refuse to sing. And then I'm supposed to spend the night. I'm not sure I'm looking forward to this.. Oh well.
I'm in another depression, that I'm sure, some of my readers, are thrilled to hear. I realized I go into them.. And get severely lonely. Andre's not helping with his 'I'm going to a friend's' speeches.

MAN. I get back from Vegas and my entire world has crumbled. I don't know why I bother. The only thing that was ever good for me was.. Nevermind. I don't need to do this. I'll just talk about Vegas and go bleed it out later.

Okay, so, we get there, and like, I'm fucking exhausted 'cause I was up all night before, and the cramped sleep on the plane didn't help AT ALL. Anyway, so, we're there and we're just doin' the normal check in stuff yadda- OMG. There was this 80 year old lady on the plane and she had to be like.. A fucking millionare. She was staying at the best place in Las Vegas, and she had a Gucci back and hat, and I'm willing to bet her shoes were from another one of those expensive stores. Mhmm. Yep. She was staying at the Bellagio. It's so fucking pretty. They have a big lakey-thing, that has fountain shows and stuff.. Yeah. She was a sweetheart - that lady. She said I was lovely and well brought up. :3 Made me happy. And then.. Oh right. Then we walked to the mall in the Bellagio (the hotels have malls) and went to Le Cirque for dinner. SP. Was the best thing I've ever eaten. @.@; I got.. Smoked salmon plate and the veal. Mmn. <3 Okay, so then we have to take a cab back 'cause it was like three blocks and I decided to wear spikey-heeled strapped sandals and got 6 blisters, to be exact. Mhmm. So then, the next day, we walk an even farther distance to the Ventician, A FUCKING AWESOME HOTEL WITH A CANNAL IN IT! OMGOMGOMG. And there was this wax museum where you could sing to a statue of Simon (American Idols) and he would tell you what he thought.. Yeah.. It was something like Madame So-n-So's Interactive Museum of Wax. Didn't do it, though. Didn't have time. And we went to this comsetics store that had EVERYTHING.. And I got make-up. :D And then we got charicatures.. And stuff. Mkay. So we stayed in the Monte Carlo. It was nice. I wasn't allowed to watch the gambling even.. Though I sat at a slot machine to spite them. :) Hmm.. And then we went to see Bob's parents, and had dinner at this Italian restaurant called Bucca diBeppo. It was nice. Had Carbonarra. <3 Mmmn. Heart attack on a plate. And then, the next day, we went to the Hoover Dam.. And that was just a big fiasco. I definately DON'T like the Hoover Dam. It was cool though, 'cause they were in the middle of a really bad draught, and half the water was gone. We had dinner at this place called The Eiffle Tower Restuarant. It was awesome. We could see everything. It was on the Eiffle Tour built for Paris (the hotel in Vegas, not the city in France). I have the (big surprise) smoked salmon and some beef and fois gras. Then, for dessert, I had a banana souflle (SP), and it turned into my all-time favorite dessert. x.x Mkay.. Then the last day we walked to Caeser's Palace. They had the biggest mall EVER. I bought most stuff there. >> Two new skirts, two tops, two sets of undergarments, shoes, perfume.. Etc. I wanted a purse, too, and it was only $148 (VERY cheap for this mall.. It had stuff like Georio Armani, Gucci, Prada, etcetc.), but she wouldn't let me 'cause I already bought so much stuff. :D Then we had dinner at this place called Spago, owned by Wolfgang Puck, and I had smoked salmon and the bass.

I never mean what I say. I can never say what I mean. It's a vicious issue that finally bit me in ass. I know what I said. And I know what I feel; but, like she said, she doesn't need to know. I wouldn't deny her the information.. If she came along and asked, but I just can't saunter up to her and tell her. And, hey, maybe she doesn't want to know. And this.. Feeling.. Is just futile. The first half, of my last entry, I said out of anger. Now that it's gone, I see how much I really meant the latter half. I did have a wonderful time with Heather. I am sad to see her go.

Heather left me. Just this minute. And I'm having a hard time feeling anything. I was expecting this. Don't think I'm not sad, and upset. And don't think I don't love her. But if she can't deal with my faults.. I deal with hers.. Actually.. I don't think she can deal with anything.. So, to you, I say au revoir, ma cherie. J'adore vous, Tim. So maybe I didn't get to kiss you in the shark tunnel. And we didn't get to have cats, and we didn't go to the zoo. I had a wonderful time with you anyway. 
Remember: no second chances.

-+-Goodbye.-+-

If I've ever owed anyone: it's Heather. I'm shit. Completely and utterly worthless. Why does she put up with me? Why does she care? When she doesn't think I do? When I don't portray it like I should? I've forgotten how to be someone's. I'm too independent perhaps? Too anti-social? Well, I've realized this, and Heather, I want to learn again, with you. If you'll let me now. I often had this fantasy, where I would be chased down my the one person I cared for most.. But I've realized. It's I who does the chasing. It's I who makes someone blissfully happy. That someone, is my Heather.
I'll do what I can.

WOW. Today was fucking long. Go to school, yadda, yadda. Then me, my mom, and Maggie (we were giving her a ride home) went around to look at a house my mom placed a bid on. OMFG. BEAUTIFUL. White picket fence, with roses growing on it. Mmn. And.. DUNDUNDUN. $10,000 STAIN-LESS STEEL HOT TUB AND HEATED POOL WITH OUTDOOR SPEAKERS.*CACKLE* Yeah, anyway. I really want to move in there. @.@ And then we got home, I watched a little Angel, and then Bob sticks his head into the living room and is like "ready to go?" I'm like "go where?" So yeah. That gave me two minutes to get out of my slump-clothes and swipe another layer of mascara on. Oof. Then we're at the restaurant, and my mom orders champagne, raises a glass, and goes "to our new house!" My jaw dropped. We got the house! And then, we decided Travis would rent it for a year, and then we'd move in. I'm so excited. Mhmm. So that's the day's events. Not much, but it wore me out. Travis and my mom are gonna go clubbing at midnight. Let's see if she lasts. I'm putting my money on the senario that she falls asleep at her desk while working on her brief (like she said she'd do to keep awake).
